<entry name="Artefacts/Healing" value=""/>

<entry name="Artefacts/Sight" value=""/>
<entry name="BlightGrenade" value=""/> <entry name="BlightGrenadeDescription" value=""/> <entry name="BlindGrenade" value=""/> <entry name="BlindGrenadeDescription" value=""/> <entry name="CombatStimulant" value=""/> <entry name="CombatStimulantDescription" value=""/> <entry name="FaolchusWing" value=""/> <entry name="FaolchusWingDescription" value=""/> <entry name="ForbiddenKnowledge" value=""/> <entry name="ForbiddenKnowledgeDescription" value=""/> <entry name="JokaeroDigitalWeapon" value=""/> <entry name="JokaeroDigitalWeaponDescription" value=""/> <entry name="LaurelsOfCommand" value=""/> <entry name="LaurelsOfCommandDescription" value=""/> <entry name="PoweredBolas" value=""/> <entry name="PoweredBolasDescription" value=""/> <entry name="StunGrenade" value=""/> <entry name="StunGrenadeDescription" value=""/> <entry name="TemporaryShield" value=""/> <entry name="TemporaryShieldDescription" value=""/>
<entry name="AdeptusMechanicus/CommandUplinkFlavor" value="“You may feel fear, you may want to flee; but when your Magos can, with a thought, stop your limbs taking a single step back, well, then you fight anyway.”
—Marshal Diktum"/>
<entry name="AdeptusMechanicus/LordOfTheMachineCultFlavor" value="“You may say, it is impossible for a man to become like the Machine. And I would reply, that only the smallest mind strives to comprehend its limits.”
—Fabricator General Kane"/>
<entry name="AdeptusMechanicus/MasterOfMachinesFlavor" value="“Our enemies may rest but rust never sleeps.”
—Tech-Priest Jung, Forge World Gehenna"/>
<entry name="AdeptusMechanicus/PowerSurgeFlavor" value="“Throw open the transonic oscillator and escalate the dereactor another three points. I require those forges running at optimal efficiency!”
—Archmagos Dyatskin, shortly before the loss of Arklis Hive Primus"/>
<entry name="AdeptusMechanicus/TechAdeptDescription" value=""/>
<entry name="AssaultDoctrineFlavor" value="“Where there is uncertainty, I shall bring light
Where there is doubt, I shall sow faith.
Where there is shame, I shall point atonement.
Where there is rage, I shall show its course.
My word in the soul shall be as my bolter in the field.”
— Litany of Devotion, traditional"/>
<entry name="AwakenTheMachineFlavor" value="“With push of Button fire the Engine
And spark Turbine into life…
Toll the Great Bell Thrice!
Sing Praise to the
God of All Machines”
— Catechism of the Autoculus of Mars"/>
<entry name="BlessingsOfTheOmnissiahFlavor" value="“Thus do we invoke the Machine God.
Thus do we make whole that which was sundered.”
— Hymn of reforging"/>
<entry name="BolsterDefencesFlavor" value="“Every position must be held to the last man: there must be no retirement. With our backs to the wall, and believing in the justice of our cause, each one of us must fight on to the end.”
— Imperial Warmaster Solon"/>
<entry name="BolterDrillFlavor" value="“I believe in three tenets of battle—firepower, firepower, and more firepower.”
— Kardan Stronos, Chapter Master of the Iron Hands"/>
<entry name="BuyHint" value="Купіць %1%%2%
%3%%4%%5%%6%%7%%8%%9%"/>
<entry name="CleansingFlame" value=""/> <entry name="CleansingFlameFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="ClusterMines" value=""/>
<entry name="ClusterMinesFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="ConstructBuildingHint" value="Будуе %1%%2%
%3%%4%%5%%6%%7%%8%%9%"/>
<entry name="ConstructFeatureHint" value="Будуе %1%%2%
%3%%4%%5%%6%%7%%8%%9%"/>
<entry name="ConstructFortificationHint" value="Будуе %1%%2%
%3%%4%%5%%6%%7%%8%%9%"/> <entry name="ConstructGaussPylon" value="Будуе "/> <entry name="ConstructGaussPylonDescription" value=""/> <entry name="ConstructGaussPylonFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="ConstructImperialStrongpoint" value="Будуе "/> <entry name="ConstructImperialStrongpointDescription" value=""/> <entry name="ConstructImperialStrongpointFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="ConstructNoctilithCrown" value="Будуе "/> <entry name="ConstructNoctilithCrownDescription" value=""/> <entry name="ConstructNoctilithCrownFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="ConstructTidewallGunrig" value="Будуе "/> <entry name="ConstructTidewallGunrigDescription" value=""/> <entry name="ConstructTidewallGunrigFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="ConstructVoidShieldGenerator" value="Будуе "/> <entry name="ConstructVoidShieldGeneratorDescription" value=""/> <entry name="ConstructVoidShieldGeneratorFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="ConstructPlayerActionHint" value="Будуе %1%%2%
%3%%4%%5%%6%%7%%8%%9%"/>
<entry name="DeedsOfGloryFlavor" value="“It is a captain's duty to place legionary lives in harm's way before his own. There is too little glory in the galaxy to go around and officers must be generous in the trust they place in others—for one day such brothers must be captains too.”
— Rouboute Guilliman, Primarch of the Ultramarines, Lord Commander and Imperial Regent"/>
<entry name="DeployCityDescription" value="Аперацыя па заснаваньні горада на абранай плітцы.
Гарады можна разьмяшчаць толькі там, дзе няма іншых гарадоў у радыусе %1% плітак."/> <entry name="DeployFortress" value=""/> <entry name="DeployFortressHint" value=""/>
<entry name="DeployUnitHint" value="Разгарнуць %1%%2%
%3%%4%%5%%6%%7%%8%%9%"/>
<entry name="DevastatorDoctrineFlavor" value="“Victory often rests on the correct weaponry being in the right place and at the right time. Even the most destructive weapons of war are worthless if absent from the battle.”
— Artor Amhrad, Chapter Master of the Astral Knights"/>
<entry name="Eldar/WebwayRedoubtDescription" value="Засноўвае горад на захопленым Шляху Павуціньня.
Гарады можна будаваць толькі ў выпадку адсутнасьці іншых гарадоў у радыусе %1% плітак. Кожны горад пасьля першага зьніжае лаяльнасьць ува ўсіх гарадах на %2%."/>
<entry name="FoundCityDescription" value="Спажывае адзінку для заснаваньня новага горада.
Гарады можна засноўваць толькі ў выпадку адсутнасьці іншых гарадоў у радыусе %1% плітак. Кожны горад пасьля першага зьніжае лаяльнасьць ува ўсіх гарадах на %2%."/>
<entry name="FoundCityNecronsDescription" value="Спажывае адзінку для абуджэньня новага горада.
Гарады можна будаваць толькі на месцы Грабніц Некронаў у выпадку адсутнасьці іншых гарадоў у радыусе 4 плітак. Кожны горад пасьля першага зьніжае лаяльнасьць ува ўсіх гарадах на 6."/>
<entry name="HealingSurgeFlavor" value="“I haven't lost an arm, brother. It's right over there.”
— Captain Alessio Cortez, Crimson Fists"/>
<entry name="IronWillFlavor" value="“Pain is temporary, Honour is forever.”
— Colonel-Commissar Ibram Gaunt, Tanith First and Only"/>
<entry name="MachineEmpathyFlavor" value="“Consider the Predator. Let your soul be armoured with Faith, driven on the tracks of obedience which overcomes all obstacles, and armed with the three great guns of Zeal, Duty and Purity.”
— Traditional Imperial prayer, source unknown"/>
<entry name="MeksToolsFlavor" value="“Yer arm? I don't care about yer arm! Me trukk's zogging ruined! Did no wun tell you to stay away from Laskannons? 'Ere, Grot. Pass me the wotsit, the thingummy, and the whacker. And the red paint, o' course. She'll be all shiny-new in no time.”
— Skinwab, Evil Sunz Mek."/>
<entry name="Necrons/DimensionalCorridorFlavor" value="“And first to walk the starlight bridge, from incorporeal to corporeal, was Artemorra, to whom the Necrontyr gave the name 'Messenger', later changed to 'Deceiver'—with good reason.”
— Fragmentary inscription on a Jokaerian Defence Orb"/>
<entry name="Necrons/RoyalGuardFlavor" value="“I have watched the galaxy for sixty million years. I have raised civilisations to our ways and seen them thrive, fade and pass into myth. And I still believe that to exist without honour, without laws—well, it is better not to exist at all.”
— Eystan, Triarch Praetorian"/>
<entry name="Necrons/ScarabHiveFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="Necrons/VoidStrikeFlavor" value="“The best weapon is the one that you never have to use.”
— Kanaa the Tranquil, Necron Cryptek, creator of the Void Strike."/>
<entry name="OrationOfRestorationFlavor" value="“At battle's end, speak the Liturgy in a clear voice. Respect the bravery of the living. Give the Rite of Passage to the fallen. Honour the battle gear of the dead. To do all this with reverence, even when exhausted by battle and weary from the field, is the duty of a Chaplain. It is his burden and satisfaction.”
— Adeptus Astartes, The Book of Faith"/>
<entry name="OrbitalBombardmentFlavor" value="“No Exterminatus Extremis order is carried out lightly. To order the death of a planet by Virus Bomb, Cyclonic Torpedo or Atmospheric Incinerator, one must be certain of one's intent. One must accept that millions, even billions, will die so that the rest of humanity may live.”
— Lord High Admiral Soheil, at the scouring of Colchis"/>
<entry name="Orks/BigBossFlavor" value="“Da bigger I iz, the 'arder I 'it.”
— Da Rok, Ork Nob"/>
<entry name="Orks/BustHeadsFlavor" value="“Oi, you zogging berks! Stop 'itting each uvver and start 'itting the beakies! Or do I have to start 'itting… you? I ain't askin'—I's tellin'. Geddit?”
— Da Rok, Ork Nob"/>
<entry name="Orks/ChannelMentalEmissionsFlavor" value="“The Orks are the pinnacle of creation. For them, the great struggle is won. They have evolved a society which knows no stress or angst. Who are we to judge them? We Aeldari who have failed, or the Humans, on the road to ruin in their turn? And why? Because we sought answers to questions that an Ork wouldn't even bother to ask! We see a culture that is strong and despise it as crude.”
— Uthan the Perverse, Aeldari Philosopher"/>
<entry name="Orks/CyborkImplantsFlavor" value="“Exhibit 40: Ork skin sample. This was from a senior individual in the Orkoid hierarchy, as can be seen from the increased thickness of bone, muscle and ablative skin, and the reduction in nerve structures. The laser grid is there to prevent it attempting to regrow the entire Ork.“
— Lecture transcripts, Grigomen “Orklover” Delr, Rogue Trader and amateur Xenologist"/>
<entry name="Orks/ExperimentalProcedureFlavor" value="“Exhibit 12: Ork biomechanical modification. 'Cyborks' are modified with equipment like this by the species' innate specialists, the 'Oddboyz', to repair major injuries and/or augment their capabilities. This one resembles an Imperial power weapon, save for the large claws and maker's mark which reads 'Grillmek woz 'ere!'“
— Lecture transcripts, Grigomen “Orklover” Delr, Rogue Trader and amateur Xenologist"/>
<entry name="Orks/ProphetOfTheWaaaghFlavor" value="“I'm da hand of Gork and Mork, dey sent me to rouse up da boyz to crush and kill 'cos da boyz forgot what dere 'ere for… I'm da profit of da Waaagh an' whole worlds burn in my boot prints. I'm Warlord Ghazghkull Mag Uruk Thraka an' I speak wiv da word of da gods.”
— Ghazghkull Mag Uruk Thraka, Ork Warlord"/>
<entry name="Orks/WarbikeTurboBoostFlavor" value="“‘Fasta, fasta! Dey can’t ‘it wot dey can’t sees! Smack all dem turbos!”
— Last words of Da Rok, Ork Nob and erstwhile warbiker."/>
<entry name="PowerStrikeFlavor" value="“My sword is at the Emperor's command. I answer to no other man, living or dead.”
— Tu'shan, Chapter Master of the Salamanders."/>
<entry name="ProduceUnitHint" value="Стварыць %1%%2%
%3%%4%%5%%6%%7%%8%%9%"/>
<entry name="SellHint" value="Прадаць %1%%2%
%3%%4%%5%%6%%7%%8%%9%"/>
<entry name="Shockwave" value=""/> <entry name="ShockwaveFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SiegeMastersFlavor" value="“A fortress circumvented ceases to be an obstacle. A fortress destroyed ceases to be a threat. Do not forget the difference.”
— Leman Russ, Primarch of the Space Wolves."/>
<entry name="SignumDescription" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/BeaconOfFaithFlavor" value="“The Khornate warriors threatened to overwhelm us, we were cut and rent and thrown aside… even the Canoness fell… and then She intervened. As She descended, a shining beacon, our wounds closed, our spirits rallied and we drove back the heretics with newfound devotion…”
— Unknown remembrancer, Gospel of the Webway"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/ChaseTheProfaneFlavor" value="“And the faithful shall be relentless in their inquisition. Nothing shall stand in the way of their will; neither the laws of men nor xenos; not qualms nor friends; not steel nor plascrete nor adamantium.”
— Canoness Vandire, In Memoriam De Virtute."/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/ConvictionOfFaithFlavor" value="“In the age since our disgrace, not one of us has fallen. We do not struggle with our qualms as other do, nor fall to the dark path. Repeat: I know no fear for I am already death.”
— Canoness Vandire, “The Rite of Conviction” from In Memoriam De Virtute."/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/DeathBeforeDisgraceFlavor" value="“What is death, to us? We are not fodder for laughing gods. We are not enshrined in stones, like the foul Aeldari. For us death is an end to service, a reward only given if we do not seek it. So act as if each moment is your last, but strive against that day with all your heart.”
— Canoness Vandire, In Memoriam De Virtute."/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/DivineGuidanceDescription" value="Павялічвае шкоду і бронепрабівальнасьць.
"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/EndlessCrusadeDescription" value="Дае Флот і Рух Праз Хованкі.
"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/EternalCrusade" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/EternalCrusadeFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/FlankSpeed" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/FlankSpeedDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/FlankSpeedFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/HealingTearsFlavor" value="“And, lo, the tears were human, tears for her lost sisters, tears for the endless war—but they were transfigured in their descent and where they struck, they blessed. And the Saint herself roused herself up with righteous fury…”
— Unknown remembrancer, Gospel of the Webway"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/IonGauntletShieldFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/KeepersOfTheFaithDescription" value="Не дае назіраць, але павялічвае зьніжэньне шкоды, калі ў адзінкі засталіся невыкарастаныя дзеяньні.
"/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/KeepersOfTheFaithFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/LeadTheRighteousFlavor" value="“A Canonness is no skulking commissar, to hide behind her sisters’ skirts and send them to her deaths. My role is to lead from the front, to inspire love and faith by my example. For we are the righteous of the Emperor and we will not fail in our aim.”
— Canoness Vandire, In Memoriam De Virtute."/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/LightOfTheEmperorDescription" value="Павялічвае трапнасьць.
"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/MiraculousInterventionDescription" value="Пасьля сьмерці Сьвятая Сэлесьціна неадкладна вяртаецца да жыцьця.
"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/NonMilitantMobilisation" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/NonMilitantMobilisationFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/PurifyingRecitations" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/PurifyingRecitationsFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/RagingFervour" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/RagingFervourFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/SacralVigorFlavor" value="“What of these wounds upon us, sisters? Is our flesh that precious to us, our beauty that sacred? Tear at these cuts, open them, they are but motes in fanciful air. Never forget that our reality is faith, and pain, like life, is evanescent…”
— Canoness Vandire, In Memoriam De Virtute."/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/SolaceInAnguishDescription" value="Павялічвае зьніжэньне шкоды.
"/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/SolaceInAnguishFlavor" value="“I had seen a Preacher impaled on a steeple. The remains of a missionary found by genestealer cultists. We felt the loss so strongly—but our anguish did not weaken us, but spurred us on…”
— Unknown remembrancer, Gospel of the Webway"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/StirringRhetoricFlavor" value="“There is no light but the light of the Emperor! There is no faith but faith in the Emperor! There is no truth but the truth of the Emperor!”
— First Exclamation of the Dialogus Order of the Resounding Vow."/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/TheEmperorsVengeanceFlavor" value="“This was not in the doctrines, nor the ephemera, nor even the apocrypha. This planet had drained the Saint, it is true. But at moments of great wrath, her true power broke through, all at once, and devastated those who dared to stand against her.”
— Unknown remembrancer, Gospel of the Webway."/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/ThePassionDescription" value="Павялічвае трапнасьць блізкага бою суседніх хаўрусных адзінак.
"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/VengefulSpirit" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/VengefulSpiritFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/WarmachinesWrath" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/WarmachinesWrathFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SkilledJinkDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SkilledJinkFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SpawnUnitsHint" value="Выклікае %1%%2%
%3%%4%%5%%6%%7%%8%%9%"/>
<entry name="TacticalDoctrineFlavor" value="“They shall be pure of heart and strong of body, untainted by doubt and unsullied by self-aggrandisement. They will be bright stars on the firmament of battle, Angels of Death whose shining wings bring swift annihilation to the enemies of Man. So it shall be for a thousand times for a thousand years, unto the very end of eternity and the extinction of mortal flesh.”
— Codex Astartes, by Roboute Guilliman, Primarch of the Ultramarines, Lord Commander and Imperial Regent"/> <entry name="Tau/AdvancedTargetingSystem" value="Усталяваць "/>
<entry name="Tau/CalmOfTidesFlavor" value="“Wait a moment. Breathe. Do not hurry to their salvation. All will come to the T’au eventually. Alive or dead.”
— Aun’Dak’E, Curator of Spirit."/>
<entry name="Tau/ConvertWildlifeFlavor" value="“Soldiers of the Fire Caste! Kroot and Vespid allies! Today, we stand as a bulwark against the selfish, the soulless, and the mad!”
— Aun'el Shi'ores, at the loss of Kronus."/> <entry name="Tau/CounterfireDefenceSystem" value="Усталяваць "/>
<entry name="Tau/DeployDroneDescription" value="Часова разгортвае %1%. Мае агульны зь іншымі здольнасьцямі разгортваньня дронаў час перазарадкі.
%2%"/> <entry name="Tau/DroneController" value="Усталяваць "/>
<entry name="Tau/ForTheGreaterGoodFlavor" value="“There are two kinds of conduct the Ethereals will not countenance. The first is a failure to reflect upon what is for the Greater Good of the T'au race. The second is the deliberate refusal to follow the path of the Greater Good when it is clear what it must be.”
— Por'ui Dal'yth Ukos, water caste envoy"/>
<entry name="Tau/KauyonFlavor" value="“Your troops are losing. They fall back! They flee! The enemy pursues, hungry for our valourous blood! Everything is lost… then your troops turn and fire. You reveal the flanking troops. And your enemy is in a pocket, encircled. The patient hunter triumphs.”
— Tutor Falsemoon"/>
<entry name="Tau/MontkaFlavor" value="“Your enemy builds his force carefully. At its centre, lie his core units. You feign weakness. You draw them out. And you focus your fire on them. Without them, the enemy is lost. Cut off the head, the beast dies. Well, except for Be’gel.”
— Tutor Falsemoon"/>
<entry name="Tau/NovaFireFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="Tau/NovaShieldFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="Tau/PreciseShotFlavor" value="“I’m not going to teach you a special deathblow. I’m not going to give you a bigger gun. I’m not going to surround you with magic shield drones willing to die for you. But I am going to teach you to shoot straight, under fire, together. That immediately makes you better than every last Gue’la.”
— Tutor Sharptongue."/>
<entry name="Tau/RinyonFlavor" value="“Your enemy encircles you. His troops are close. Too close. Your targeting network assigns every Fire Caste a victim, not his neighbour. You fire as one, every shot strikes, they fall as one. A distracted enemy is as good as dead.”
— Tutor Falsemoon"/>
<entry name="Tau/RipykaFlavor" value="“The enemy’s armour is thick, your blade makes only a scratch. In his arrogance, he allows you to strike. Hit the same spot, ten, a hundred, a thousand times. That scratch becomes a dent becomes a hole becomes his death. Water erodes the stone.”
— Tutor Falsemoon"/>
<entry name="Tau/ProjectShieldFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="Tau/SenseOfStoneFlavor" value="“There are only four thoughts the Fire Caste must know. Knowing when to hide. Knowing when to defend. Knowing when to mislead. And knowing when to strike. Ask nothing more.”
— Aun’Dak’E, Curator of Spirit."/> <entry name="Tau/ShieldGenerator" value="Усталяваць "/>
<entry name="Tau/StealthFieldFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="Tau/StimulantInjector" value="Усталяваць "/>
<entry name="Tau/StormOfFireFlavor" value="“It burns so briefly, the light of my children, so briefly. But, by the Greater Good, it burns so bright!”
— Aun’Va, Master of the Undying Spirit."/>
<entry name="Tau/SubvertCityFlavor" value="“What’s that? You call that a house!? Someone lives in that?! Oh my. Well, it shows just how brave you all are. Your masters know you don’t need proper shelter or water or food or sleep or rest to die doing your jobs, for the ‘Great Emperator’! If he even exists. Anyway, if you change your mind about joining the T’au, do let me know.”
— Por'el Dal'kor Slytongue, water caste emissary"/>
<entry name="Tau/VectoredRetroThrusters" value="Усталяваць "/>
<entry name="Tau/VelocityTracker" value="Усталяваць "/>
<entry name="Tau/ZephyrsGraceFlavor" value="“Let none doubt that the Tau Empire will bring unity to all – let none doubt that now is our time. Forward, for the Greater Good!”
— Aun’Va, Master of the Undying Spirit."/>
<entry name="TheFleshIsWeakFlavor" value="“We have been wounded sorely. Yet still we stand, with fire in our eyes and valour in our hearts. Let them think us beaten. We shall teach them otherwise.”
— Pedro Kantor, Chapter Master of the Crimson Fists"/>
<entry name="Tyranids/AlphaWarriorFlavor" value="“To think that Tyranids are mindless beasts is a grave mistake. When you fight Tyranids you face not only those before you on the battlefield, but the untold thousands which seek to surround you, which attack your supporting units and destroy your supply lines in perfect synchronicity.”
— Marneus Calgar, Chapter Master of the Ultramarines"/>
<entry name="Tyranids/BroodProgenitorFlavor" value="“This horror, this abomination, has thought and purpose that functions on an unimaginable, galactic scale and all we can do is try to stop the swarms of bioengineered monsters it unleashes upon us by instinct. We have given the horror a name to salve our fears; we call it the Tyranid race, but if it is aware of us at all it must know us only as Prey.”
— Inquisitor Czevak"/>
<entry name="Tyranids/ConstructTunnel" value="Пабудаваць "/> <entry name="Tyranids/ConstructTunnelFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="Tyranids/ExploitWeaknessesFlavor" value="“We retreat, we fall back, we make strategic withdrawals, we consolidate, we evacuate. When in the name of all that's holy are we going to fight back?”
— Commissar General Vortigus Hornth, Acting Warmaster; Diatan Sector, Ultima Segmentum"/>
<entry name="Tyranids/HiveCommanderFlavor" value="“A new Tyrant joined the fray and, in an eyeblink, the whole character of the swarm changed. The ravening berserker-spirit that had driven the Tyranids onto the ridge was gone as if it had never existed. Left in its place was something cannier and infinitely more worrisome. It was then that I knew the battle to be lost.”
— Sergeant Torias Telion, Ultramarines 10th Company"/>
<entry name="Tyranids/IndescribableHorrorFlavor" value="“We cannot live through this. Mankind cannot live through this. In a single day they have covered the surface of this planet with a flood of living blades and needle-fanged mouths. Kill one and ten take its place. If they are truly without number then our race is doomed to a violent death before every shred of our civilization is scoured away by a force more voracious than the fires of hell themselves! Death! By the Machine God, Death is here!”
— Magos Varnak, Overseer of the Tyran research station"/>
<entry name="Tyranids/InstinctiveBehaviourOverrideFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="Tyranids/LivingBatteringRamFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="Tyranids/PsychicScream" value=""/> <entry name="Tyranids/PsychicScreamFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="Tyranids/ScourgeOfTheBroodFlavor" value="“As I looked into its dead black eyes, I saw the terrible sentience it had in place of a soul. Behind that was the steel will of its leader. Further still I could feel its primogenitor coldly assessing me from the void. And looking back from the deepest recesses of the alien's mind I perceived what I can only describe as an immortal hunger.”
— Chief Librarian Varro Tigurius of the Ultramarines"/>
<entry name="Tyranids/SubterraneanAssaultFlavor" value="“How ironic it is that as fast as we spread progress and hope throughout the galaxy, the Tyranids spread death and despair. Only united can we hope to stand against them.”
— Aun'shi of the T'au Empire"/>
